# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the first element in a nonempty buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var startIndex: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The `startIndex` property of an `UnsafeMutableBufferPointer` instance is always zero.
title: startIndex
